price: Nami najikinga kwa Mola wangu Mlezi na ndiye Mola wenu Mlezi pia, ili msinipige mawe.
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ
footnotes: Na mimi najilinda na Mwenye kuniumba msiweze kuniuwa kwa kunipiga mawe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
